_header: Thy saint mother was full woe
_description: A poem of the Passion — six lines (aabccb)

HerefordO311.Transcription:
Þi sente moder was ful woÞo he saht þe pine soAnd
                    ti blod fel to grundeWith þe sarpe spere stikeAn ti milde herte
                    brekeSo wo was hire þu stu[n]de
HerefordO311.Editions:
Edden,  Valerie. 
             “A Fragment of Verse in Hereford Cathedral Library MS O.III.11.” 
             Notes and Queries
         n.s. 44 [242] (1997): 309-10: 309-10.
